sentences.en: A wicked messenger falls into trouble, but a trustworthy envoy brings healing.
sentences.cn: 奸恶的使者,必陷在祸患里.忠信的使臣, 乃医人的良药.

sentences.en: Edwin H. Conger was envoy extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary.
sentences.cn: 埃德温·H.康格是特命全权公使。

sentences.en: Egypt recalls Israel envoy after Gaza Strip air strike.
sentences.cn: 迦萨走廊空袭之后,埃及召回驻以色列大使.

sentences.en: Envoy é sp é cial à Dujiangyan ( Sichuan ) ABEL SEGRETIN.
sentences.cn: AbelSegretin来自都江堰 ( 四川 ) 的特别报道.

sentences.en: He sent Evans as his personal envoy to discuss ways to mend relations between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 他派埃文斯以私人特使的身份前往商讨修复两国关系的途径。

sentences.en: He was not perhaps the ideal envoy.
sentences.cn: 他大概不是理想的使节.

sentences.en: She is a famous diplomatic envoy.
South Korean Politicians Demand Apology for American Envoy's'Insult '.
sentences.cn: 美韩牛肉争执升温韩国自由派反美.

sentences.en: The envoy bore back to us tidings of war.
sentences.cn: 使节给我们带回了战争的消息.

sentences.en: The envoy extraordinary has flown to the Middle East.
The President sent a special envoy to the peace talks.
sentences.cn: 总统派了一名特使参加和平谈判.

sentences.en: The President's envoy set off on another diplomatic trip.
sentences.cn: 总统的使节开始了又一次外交之旅。

sentences.en: The special envoy's visit established a link between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 特使的出访在两国间建立了联系.

sentences.en: The United Nations is sending a special envoy to the area.
sentences.cn: 联合国将向该地区派遣一位特使。

sentences.en: We've got lots , says a prime ministerial envoy.

trans.tran_en: someone who is sent to another country as an official representative
